alert.note: Alert for Grady; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 6:18PM EDT until September 07 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Leon County in Big Bend Florida... Grady County in southwestern Georgia... Southwestern Thomas County in south central Georgia... * Until 700 PM EDT. * At 618 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Cairo, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cairo, Thomasville, Whigham, Reno, Akridge, Grady Co A/p, Princes Still, Capel, Moncrief, Pine Park, Rocky Hill, and Beachton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail, damaging wind, and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
